title: Rugby Rovigo Delta
text:
Rugby Rovigo Delta, formerly known until 2010 as Rugby Rovigo, is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> club currently competing in the <a href="Top12">Top12</a>.
They are based in <a href="Rovigo">Rovigo</a>, in <a href="Veneto">Veneto</a>.
The club was founded in 1935 by medical student Dino Lanzoni, who discovered rugby at university.
They quickly became one of the strongest Italian sides and won 13 titles between 1951 and 2021. They have never been relegated from the top flight of Italian rugby union. They are the current Italian champion.
Current and former Rovigo players include <a href="Elio%20De%20Anna">Elio De Anna</a>, <a href="Stefano%20Bettarello">Stefano Bettarello</a>, <a href="Stefano%20Bordon">Stefano Bordon</a>, <a href="Alessandro%20Moscardi">Alessandro Moscardi</a>, <a href="Carlo%20Orlandi">Carlo Orlandi</a>, <a href="Carlo%20Checchinato">Carlo Checchinato</a>, <a href="Mirco%20Bergamasco">Mirco Bergamasco</a>, <a href="Manuel%20Contepomi">Manuel Contepomi</a>, <a href="AJ%20Venter">AJ Venter</a>, <a href="Gert%20Smal">Gert Smal</a>, <a href="Viliami%20Ofahengaue">Viliami Ofahengaue</a> and <a href="Naas%20Botha">Naas Botha</a>.
